scripts.format: npm run format:frontend && npm run format:tauri && npm run format:fetch
scripts.lint: npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:tauri && npm run lint:fetch
scripts.update: npm run update:frontend && npm run update:tauri && npm run update:fetch
scripts.fetch: cd riic-fetch && cargo run --release && npm run format:frontend
scripts.lint:tauri: cd src-tauri && cargo fmt --check && cargo clippy
scripts.lint:fetch: cd riic-fetch && cargo fmt --check && cargo clippy
scripts.update:tauri: cd src-tauri && cargo upgrade --incompatible && cargo update
scripts.update:fetch: cd riic-fetch && cargo upgrade --incompatible && cargo update
